author: yaman koudmani
comment: The Wear version is pretty bad. No way to exit (unless you have the palm gesture on). This would have been okay if it was the only problem. It's not. The beginning of the game (first 50-100m) is really slow and boring, completely unnecessarily slow. The deal breaker for the Wear version is that sometimes, there are cars in all 3 lanes at the same time so you have no where to go and die. This sucks and ends the game prematurely.
title: Phone version is pretty good... Meh for LG G Watch

author: Ensorcel Gamer
comment: Works very well but please improve the a little problem in response otherthan that works like butter

author: Gabby Mendez
comment: It does go with your moto 360 bull crap
title: It sucks

comment: This game is so boring no challenge at all.

comment: You know it doesnt say FOR ANDROID WEAR OR ANYTHING ABSOLUTE PEICE OF TRASH

author: Z Fuser
comment: Its not even for android watches

author: Mete Cinar
comment: It force closes on watch.

author: Matt F
comment: Watch screen still turns off while playing the game if you go awhile without switching lanes, fix this please LG Urbane
title: Huge Issue

author: Mitch Bumgardner
comment: No way to exit out of the game. Will fix my rating after that is fixed.

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Mitch thank you for the feedback. If you tap longer than 3 second quit button will appear.

title: One fatal flaw.

author: Lance Hough
comment: I've tried to launch this app 3 times in my Moto 360 it crashes it every time. :-(

comment: It doesn't launch on my Moto 360, please fix.

title: Huawei Watch

author: rehan malik
comment: nice game with very amazing bikes love it

author: Aaron Bell
comment: crashes my moto 360 every time
title: never opens

author: Toby Powell-blyth
comment: This game was fun to play but it downloaded 250mb of data I. The background so I am uninstalling . would welcome feedback from developer on it

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Toby, We apologize for the inconvenience caused in this regard. We have resolved the issue. Please update the game and try again. If the problem persists, please let us know at feedback@teensystudios.com. Thank you for your feedback

title: Good game but..

author: Eric Christensen
comment: Slowed my Moto 360 to a crawl, and was impossible to quit out of. Had to force my watch off, uninstalled from my phone and pray it did the same on the watch (which it did). Ridiculous shovelware with no attention to quality. Shame on you.
title: Horrible UX and awful stability

author: scott mckee jr
comment: Installed in my moto 360 and tapped to load and all it did was twist up my watch face and never loaded.

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Scott, stay tuned for the coming update. We will cover round watches in it. Thank you.

title: Trash

author: Mike Kennedy
comment: This game would not play on my Moto 360....

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Mike, stay tuned for the coming update. We will cover round watches in it. Thank you.
